Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 37th overall pick, by Montreal in 2020...
Traded from Montreal to Detroit on 3/2/2020 (Going to DET: C Todd Lichtenstein. Going to MON: 2B Cosme Roxas)...
Injured on 5/26/2020 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 7/14/2021 with a Inflamed Hip Muscle, out for 5 days...
Had first career hit on 7/22/2022, off Leo Pacheco (BRO)...
Injured on 5/12/2023 with a Bruised Heel, out for 4 days...
Hit first career homerun on 6/21/2023, off Teodoro Machado (SF)...
Traded from Detroit to St. Louis (C) on 7/30/2024 (Going to DET: C Manuel Rodarte. Going to STL: P Douglas Combs, LF James Ostrowski, C Todd Lichtenstein)...
Injured on 7/23/2025 with a Fractured Jaw, out for 4 weeks...
Released by St. Louis (C) on 5/31/2026...
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 3/1/2027 to a minor league contract.
